project.description:
Build the dpkg source distributions
Nodes with the launchpad label need the 'RethinkDB Packaging' GPG keys available.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PACKAGE_BUILD_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The fourth number in the version, after the dash.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
[ -d rethinkdb ] || git clone https://github.com/rethinkdb/rethinkdb.git rethinkdb
rm -f rethinkdb_*
cd rethinkdb
git clean -fxd
echo PACKAGE_BUILD_NUMBER: $PACKAGE_BUILD_NUMBER UBUNTU_RELEASE=precise ./scripts/gen-trailer.sh
git checkout --detach git fetch origin --tags "$GIT_REF" git checkout -f FETCH_HEAD
./configure --fetch all make support VERBOSE=1 for ubrelease in $UBUNTU_RELEASES_REGULAR ; do make UBUNTU_RELEASE="$ubrelease" build-deb-src VERBOSE=1 done
for ubrelease in $UBUNTU_RELEASES_PORTABLE; do make BUILD_PORTABLE=1 STATIC_V8=1 UBUNTU_RELEASE=$ubrelease build-deb-src VERBOSE=1 done
mv build/packages/*.* .. || true
